name: Land 'O Flags
description:
LAND O' FLAGS

You are Lando Flagmann, brave ocean explorer. You have just discovered a slew of undocumented islands. You must claim them for your country!

Claim islands for your country by bringing your country's flag to the highest point on the island (as is the traditional way of claiming things).

You only have one flag, so don't lose it!

Controls:

Arrows/WASD/Dpad : Move

Left mouse button/Z/B : Attack

Made for CCAWJAM 3: https://itch.io/jam/ccawjam-3

Source code: https://github.com/verdog/land-o-flags

This game uses m3x6 by Daniel Linssen: https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
